DOC.brief_title: A Study Use Chartis Assessment System Optimize Subject Selection Endobronchial Lung Volume Reduction .
DOC.detailed_description: This multi-center study enroll 120 patient . Subjects undergo Chartis Assessment prior EBV treatment . The Chartis assessment determine presence absence collateral ventilation , potential determine factor success EBV therapy . This study randomize ; subject eligible receive EBV Treatment , regardless Chartis Assessment outcome . Follow-up data collect patient meet Chartis inclusion criterion .
DOC.criteria: Heterogeneous emphysema Able obtain Chartis value Assessment Any coexist major medical problem would make possible subject tolerate bronchoscopic procedure .
